description: To satisfy the desire of millennials in a rapidly growing youth travel market, Pally has developed two products: Pally Social, a mobile app that enables people in new cities to connect with locals of the given city to ask for tips on the best things to do, as well as meet up with them. The second is Pally Adventures, a community marketplace where visitors can immerse themselves in new cities through experiences curated and hosted by locals. Visitors are able to access these experiences through our Progressive Web Application and can exchange and pay with community tokens (PallyCoins)
name: Pally
